title: torch/lib/libATen.so--Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault
body_html:
Issue description

An Error Process finished with exit code 139 (interrupted by signal 11: SIGSEGV) reported by PyCharm with the code out = net(input). In the gdb mode, the Error information is Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault. and seems point to "torch/lib/libATen.so".
Provide a short description.
I install Pytorch by conda on unbuntu. When I run the code of Neural Networks of the tutorial. An Error Process finished with exit code 139 (interrupted by signal 11: SIGSEGV) reported by PyCharm. In the gdb mode, the Error is Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault. and seems point to "torch/lib/libATen.so". My GCC Version is GCC 4.8.4. Need Update?

Code example

This is gdb Error Info:

[Thread debugging using libthread_db enabled]
Using host libthread_db library "/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libthread_db.so.1".
Net(
  (conv1): Conv2d(1, 6, kernel_size=(5, 5), stride=(1, 1))
  (conv2): Conv2d(6, 16, kernel_size=(5, 5), stride=(1, 1))
  (fc1): Linear(in_features=400, out_features=120, bias=True)
  (fc2): Linear(in_features=120, out_features=84, bias=True)
  (fc3): Linear(in_features=84, out_features=10, bias=True)
)
10
(6, 1, 5, 5)
[New Thread 0x7fffba86e700 (LWP 25754)]
True
[New Thread 0x7fffba06c780 (LWP 25755)]
[New Thread 0x7fffb9c6b800 (LWP 25756)]
[New Thread 0x7fffb986a880 (LWP 25757)]
[New Thread 0x7fffb9469900 (LWP 25758)]
[New Thread 0x7fffb9068980 (LWP 25759)]
[New Thread 0x7fffb8c67a00 (LWP 25760)]

[New Thread 0x7fff9affad80 (LWP 25767)]
[New Thread 0x7fff9abf9e00 (LWP 25768)]
[New Thread 0x7fff9a7f8e80 (LWP 25769)]

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x000000000060fbe0 in ?? ()
(gdb) where
#0  0x000000000060fbe0 in ?? ()
#1  0x00007fffbf97d5d2 in mkl_blas_avx2_sgemm_initialize_kernel_info ()
   from /home/rjzn/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/libATen.so
#2  0x00007fff754dd894 in ?? ()
   from /home/rjzn/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/numpy/core/../../../../libmkl_avx2.so
#3  0x00007ffff2e05c3f in ?? ()
   from /home/rjzn/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/numpy/core/../../../../libmkl_intel_thread.so

   from /home/rjzn/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/numpy/core/../../../../libmkl_intel_thread.so
#5  0x00007ffff46a8145 in ?? ()
   from /home/rjzn/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/numpy/core/../../../../libmkl_intel_lp64.so
#6  0x00007fffbdcb9671 in THFloatBlas_gemm ()
   from /home/rjzn/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/libATen.so
#7  0x00007fffbda55941 in THFloatTensor_addmm ()
   from /home/rjzn/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/libATen.so
#8  0x00007fffbddaa540 in THNN_FloatSpatialConvolutionMM_updateOutput_frame(THFloatTensor*, THFloatTensor*, THFloatTensor*, THFloatTensor*, THFloatTensor*, int, int, int, int, int, int, long, long, long, long, long, long) ()
   from /home/rjzn/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/libATen.so
---Type <return> to continue, or q <return> to quit---

   from /home/rjzn/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/libATen.so

   from /home/rjzn/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/libATen.so

Issue description
An Error Process finished with exit code 139 (interrupted by signal 11: SIGSEGV) reported by PyCharm with the code out = net(input). In the gdb mode, the Error information is Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault. and seems point to "torch/lib/libATen.so".
Provide a short description.
I install Pytorch by conda on unbuntu.  When I run the code of Neural Networks of the tutorial. An Error Process finished with exit code 139 (interrupted by signal 11: SIGSEGV) reported by PyCharm.  In the gdb mode, the Error  is Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault. and seems point to "torch/lib/libATen.so".  My GCC Version is GCC 4.8.4. Need Update?
Code example
This is gdb Error Info:
[Thread debugging using libthread_db enabled]
Using host libthread_db library "/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libthread_db.so.1".

  (conv1): Conv2d(1, 6, kernel_size=(5, 5), stride=(1, 1))

  (fc2): Linear(in_features=120, out_features=84, bias=True)

body:
## Issue description
An Error **Process finished with exit code 139 (interrupted by signal 11: SIGSEGV)** reported by PyCharm with the code ```out = net(input)```. In the gdb mode, the Error information is *Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.* and seems point to "torch/lib/libATen.so". 
Provide a short description.
I install Pytorch by conda on unbuntu.  When I run the code of *Neural Networks* of the tutorial. An Error **Process finished with exit code 139 (interrupted by signal 11: SIGSEGV)** reported by PyCharm.  In the gdb mode, the Error  is *Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.* and seems point to "torch/lib/libATen.so".  My GCC Version is GCC 4.8.4. Need Update?
## Code example
This is gdb Error Info:
```
[Thread debugging using libthread_db enabled]
Using host libthread_db library "/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libthread_db.so.1".
Net(

  (conv2): Conv2d(6, 16, kernel_size=(5, 5), stride=(1, 1))
  (fc1): Linear(in_features=400, out_features=120, bias=True)
  (fc2): Linear(in_features=120, out_features=84, bias=True)
  (fc3): Linear(in_features=84, out_features=10, bias=True)
)
```
